gobblin.data.management.retention.profile

Class ConfigurableGlobDatasetFinder<T extends Dataset>

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.data.management.retention.profile.ConfigurableGlobDatasetFinder<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DatasetsFinder<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CopyableGlobDatasetFinder, DefaultFileSystemGlobFinder, GlobCleanableDatasetFinder, ManagedCleanableDatasetFinder, ModificationTimeDatasetProfile, ProxyableDatasetProfile, SnapshotDatasetProfile, SubsetFilesCopyableDatasetFinder, TrackingDatasetProfile

    public abstract class ConfigurableGlobDatasetFinder<T extends Dataset>
extends Object
implements DatasetsFinder<T>
    A configurable DatasetsFinder that looks for CleanableDatasets using a glob pattern.

      • findDatasets

        public List<T> findDatasets()
                     throws IOException
        Finds all directories satisfying the input glob pattern, and creates a CleanableDataset for each one using datasetAtPath(org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path).
        Specified by:
        findDatasets in interface DatasetsFinder<T extends Dataset>
        Returns:
        List of CleanableDatasets in the file system.

        IOException

      • datasetAtPath

        public abstract T datasetAtPath(Path path)
                         throws IOException
        Creates a CleanableDataset from a path. The default implementation creates a ConfigurableCleanableDataset.
        Parameters:
        path - Path where dataset is located.
        Returns:
        CleanableDataset at that path.
        Throws:
